subject: Awaits your response
body:
Dear Rosa Your quick response to my mail is quite appreciated. I need 
your full cooperation to enable me to present and file in your name as 
the due beneficiary and next of kin to Late Greg  who died as a result 
of COVID-19 Pandemic. Until his death he was an oil contractor and lived 
all his life here in China and Malaysia, but unfortunately he died 
intestate ie without a will.

These funds in question are deposited in a local bank here in Malaysia 
and also in China, and if they are not claimed within time as permitted 
by the government, the government will confiscate it. Presently, I am in 
possession of the death records of my client, the deceased with all 
documents, and considering the present state of affairs, I will make 
them available to you only when you agree to work with me as partners

I want this done so that I can use a good part of my share for helping 
the poor and the needy and for charity works. You shall receive 50% for 
your assistance while 40% for me and the remaining 10% on all expenses 
that will be incurred during the execution of this transaction. However, 
I must assure you that this transaction is safe and all modalities are 
in place to ensure that this is done in a legitimate way without a 
single breach of law. Based on your maximum cooperation, we will 
finalize this transaction within 14 working days.

I shall require from you, your FULL NAME and CONTACT ADDRESS WITH 
NUMBERS, OCCUPATION, COUNTRY to start the process of claim in this 
regard.

Again I guarantee that everything is under control and you have nothing 
to worry about, Just grant me your full cooperation and keep this 
transaction confidential.

Barr Robert Goulston
Advocate & Solicitor
